Events.OnCreate:
(block (gate1 gate2 convoyDesc) (switch (not (setq gate1 (random (sysFindObject gSource "G -uncharted;")))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Second gate must be at least 200 light-seconds from first (not (setq gate2 (random (sysFindObject gate1 "GR:200; -uncharted;")))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Do we have any valid variants for the current system level (not (setq convoyDesc (filter (msnGetStaticData gSource 'convoy) theDesc (and (geq (sysGetLevel) (@ theDesc 'minLevel)) (leq (sysGetLevel) (@ theDesc 'maxLevel)) ) ) )) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Choose mission variant (block ( (theRoll (random 1 (+ (map convoyDesc theDesc (@ theDesc 'chance))))) ) (msnSetData gSource 'convoyDesc (match convoyDesc theDesc (ls (setq theRoll (- theRoll (@ theDesc 'chance))) 1) )) (msnSetData gSource 'gate1ID (objGetID gate1)) (msnSetData gSource 'gate2ID (objGetID gate2)) ) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gate1ID))) (travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) )
(msnAddTimerEvent gSource (+ travelTime (random 200 300)) 'OnConvoyArrives) )
Events.OnConvoyArrives:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gate1 (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gate1ID))) (gate2 (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gate2ID))) (convoyDesc (msnGetData gSource 'convoyDesc)) targetID )
; Create the convoy (enum (@ convoyDesc 'ships) convoyEntry (block (shipObj) (setq shipObj (sysCreateShip (@ convoyEntry 'principalType) gate1 &svAres;)) (shpOrder shipObj 'gate gate2) (objSetData shipObj 'CSCMission12 (objGetID gSource)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource shipObj)
; Add treasure (objAddRandomItems shipObj &tbAresFreighterTreasure; 1)
; Set initial target to the first ship (if (not targetID) (setq targetID (objGetID shipObj)))
; Create the escorts (enum (@ convoyEntry 'escortTypes) theType (block (escortObj) (setq escortObj (sysCreateShip theType gate1 &svAres;)) (shpOrder escortObj 'escort shipObj) ) ) ) )
(msnSetData gSource 'targetID targetID) (msnSetData gSource 'targetsLeft (count (@ convoyDesc 'ships))) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; Wingman destroyed (objGetData aObjDestroyed (cat (objGetID gSource) "_wingman;")) (msnIncData gSource 'wingmenLost)
; Enemy destroyed (= (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'CSCMission12) (objGetID gSource)) (block Nil (if (= aDestroyReason 'enteredStargate) (msnIncData gSource 'targetsEscaped) (msnIncData gSource 'targetsDestroyed) )
; Do we need to update the players target (if (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) (block Nil ; LATER: check that these ships belog to this mission instance (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "sAND:CSCMission12;"))) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) )
; Check if this was the last target (if (leq (msnIncData gSource 'targetsLeft -1) 0) (block ( (escaped (msnGetData gSource 'targetsEscaped)) (destroyed (msnGetData gSource 'targetsDestroyed)) (lost (msnGetData gSource 'wingmenLost)) ) (if (or (= destroyed 0) (gr lost destroyed)) (msnFailure gSource) (msnSuccess gSource) ) ) ) ) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget: (if (msnGetData gSource 'targetID) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 'attack) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gate1ID)) 'dock) )
Events.OnCanDebrief:
(block ( (targetsDestroyed (msnGetData gSource 'targetsDestroyed)) wingmenLeft ) ; Wingmen leave (setq wingmenLeft (intFleetDisperseWingmen gSource)) (msnSetData gSource 'wingmenLeft wingmenLeft)
; Calculate mission XP (msnIncData gSource 'missionXP (* 100 targetsDestroyed)) (msnIncData gSource 'missionXP (* 50 wingmenLeft))
Nil )

Language.Text:
Intercept and destroy an Ares supply convoy before it can leave the system.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %payment%

The XO walks up to you.
"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you."
"A large Ares convoy will enter the system at %gateName%. Take a flight of Centurions and destroy as many freighters as you can before they leave the system. Any questions?"
Language.String: "Get the hell out of here then!"
"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"
Language.Text:
(block ( (wingmenLeft (msnGetData gSource 'wingmenLeft)) (targetsDestroyed (msnGetData gSource 'targetsDestroyed)) ) (switch (= wingmenLeft 0) (msnTranslate gSource "textFailureDebrief:1")
; Lost more wingmen than targets (gr (- 6 wingmenLeft) targetsDestroyed) (msnTranslate gSource "textFailureDebrief:2")
; No targets destroyed (= targetsDestroyed 0) (msnTranslate gSource "textFailureDebrief:3")
(msnTranslate gSource "textFailureDebrief:4") ) )
Language.String: "What kind of a leader loses all %his% wingmen and dares to return alive! Next time do us all a favor and kill yourself!"
"You lost more wingmen against those freighters than most people do against an Ares dreadnought! Your leadership skills are pathetic. Get out of my sight!"
"You didn't even destroy a single freighter! That wing of Centurions is wasted on you!"
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
"A tough mission. We can't afford to lose so many good pilots."
"Good mission! It's unfortunate that only %shipsLeft% of your wingmen survived."
"Outstanding mission! Looks like you came back with %shipsLeft% wingmen."
